main_definition: The name 'Chris' is a common shortened form of the Greek name Christos, which means 'anointed one'. However, it can also be used as an informal idiom or nickname for someone named Christian.

meanings_and_examples.example: When my friend first met Chris, he was surprised by his name and asked if 'Chris' was a short form of his real name.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An affectionate way to refer to someone named Christian
meanings_and_examples.example: During the party, people called each other 'Chris', which made everyone feel more friendly and relaxed.
